name: Gem Collector (itch) (Ben Thompson)
description:
Prototype platformer developed for Global Games Jam 2021

As you traverse the ruins, you find your abilities being stolen from you! Avoid danger and collect the gems to get them back.

Controls:
RUN - A/D or Left/Right Arrow Keys
JUMP - Space
DASH - C
In-game buttons are controlled with the mouse cursor

Credits:
Ben Thompson - Game / Level Design, Programming
Josh Thompson - Programming, Art
Jacob Bas - Level Design, Programming

Platform Character Pack by Thomas Lea
SUPER PIXEL DUNGEON by unTied Games
Gems / Coins Free by La Red Games
Walls Are Watching by Sara Garrard
